meanings.definition: In a way that is not expected or anticipated.
meanings.sent1: She arrived unexpectedly at the party.
meanings.sent2: The thunderstorm unexpectedly disrupted the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The magician unexpectedly pulled a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The news of the victory spread unexpectedly fast.
meanings.sent5: The car unexpectedly screeched to a halt.

meanings.sent1: An unexpected visitor knocked on the door unexpectedly.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected rain caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected plot twist in the movie made everyone gasp.
meanings.sent4: Her unexpected talent for painting shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected snowfall blanketed the town in white.
